spec.name: Cité Ain Chock
spec.description: Cité Aïn Chock is a large, established residential neighborhood or 'cité' within the Aïn Chock prefecture of Casablanca. As a residential district, it is characterized by concentrated housing developments, public amenities, local markets, and green spaces (such as the nearby Central Park of Ain Chok). It reflects the post-war and post-independence urban expansion of Casablanca, designed to provide housing for the city's rapidly growing population.
